body_html:
I'm not sure I completely understand your question... The documentation for NextQueuedSequenceBatch (object returned from tf.contrib.training.batch_sequences_with_states) seems to suggest that the state() and save_state() methods could be used to see / store the values of the states.

Also, I think this question might be more suitable for StackOverflow.

body:
I'm not sure I completely understand your question... The documentation for NextQueuedSequenceBatch (object returned from tf.contrib.training.batch_sequences_with_states) seems to suggest that the state() and save_state() methods could be used to see / store the values of the states. 

Also, I think this question might be more suitable for StackOverflow.
